meta.name: Political Solemn
meta.description: 庄重政工风格，深红灰色，适合会议纪要、工作报告

base.container: background-color: #ffffff; color: #262626; font-family: 'FangSong', 'STFangsong', serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.85; padding: 28px;

header_window.style: background-color: #8b1a1a; border: 2px solid #8b1a1a; border-radius: 0; padding: 12px 24px; margin-bottom: 32px;

headings.h2: color: #8b1a1a; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; margin: 32px 0 20px; padding: 10px 0; border-bottom: 2px solid #d4d4d4;
headings.h3: color: #a83d3d; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; margin: 24px 0 14px; padding-left: 14px; border-left: 4px solid #8b1a1a;
headings.h1: color: #8b1a1a; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; margin: 32px 0 20px; padding: 10px 0; border-bottom: 2px solid #d4d4d4;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background-color: #f0f0f0; color: #5a5a5a; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 2px; font-family: 'KaiTi', serif;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #f5f5f5; color: #3a3a3a; padding: 16px; border-radius: 4px; margin: 20px 0; border-left: 4px solid #8b1a1a;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #fafafa; border: 1px solid #d4d4d4; color: #5a5a5a; padding: 14px 20px; margin: 20px 0;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #fff5f5; border: 1px solid #d4a5a5; color: #8b1a1a; padding: 14px 20px; margin: 20px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #fafafa; border: 1px solid #d4d4d4; color: #8a8a8a; padding: 30px; text-align: center; margin: 24px 0;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 50px; padding-top: 20px; border-top: 2px solid #8b1a1a; text-align: center;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
